snippet: The Knicks’ J. R. Smith missed eight of nine shots, committed four turnovers and spent the fourth quarter on the bench in his regular-season debut.
abstract: New York Knicks guard J R Smith struggles against San Antonio Spurs in his season debut after being suspended for first five games for violating NBA's antidrug policy.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ J. R. Smith missed eight of nine shots, committed four turnovers and spent the fourth quarter on the bench in his regular-season debut.

headline.main: Smith Returns, but His Game Does Not
headline.print_headline: Smith Returns, but His Game Does Not
